The Matrix: Exploring Scientific Data

As part of our award-winning support for U.S. EPA’s Office of Water, we built a series of highly customized dashboards for the National Lakes Assessment, using JavaScript and D3.js. Crow Insight has also helped EPA with social media shareable graphics, reporting, and methodological explanations for the assessment. The dashboard below lets users look for broad patterns across ecological indicators and regions. Other views allow more precise comparisons, while still reflecting statistical uncertainty.
